title: Bride and Prejudice's Dannii and Denton now having sex TWICE a day
text:
They're the Bride and Prejudice couple who made headlines last week when they revealed that their lovemaking lasts just 15 seconds.

But now things have picked up for Dannii and Denton, with the pair confirming that Denton is lasting between five and ten minutes in the bedroom these days.

In a Q&A with fans on Facebook on Monday, the happy couple dished raunchy details about their sex life.

'We're doing well!' Bride and Prejudice's Dannii and Denton have revealed they are now having sex twice a day and their sessions are lasting between five and ten minutes

'It's better than fifteen seconds now and I can attest to that,' Denton said proudly.

Dannii added: 'We're up to about five or ten minutes now, so we're doing well.'

Keen to boast about their improved love life, Denton added that they are having sex a lot more often since filming wrapped.

'We're up to about once or twice a day now, just in case anyone's really counting,' Denton said with a smile during a Facebook Q&A on Monday

'And we're up to about once or twice a day now, just in case anyone's really counting,' he said with a smile.

During Bride and Prejudice, the couple revealed they were only having sex once a month.

In one episode, the pair had sex after a long drought, but Dannii was disappointed that it only lasted 15 seconds.

'Try and last a little bit longer': During Bride and Prejudice, the couple revealed they were only having sex once a month

'I think the next time we have sex, I know it's hard for you, but try and last a little bit longer,' she said after they'd done the deed.

'I start to enjoy it and then all of a sudden you're done.'

She also admitted that she hadn't had an orgasm in around six months due to Denton's early finishes.
description: They're the Bride and Prejudice couple who made headlines last week when they revealed  that their lovemaking lasts just 15 seconds.
